definition: to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)
sentence/clause/phrase/classifier for phrases or lines of verse

sentences.english: Choices D and E produce sentence fragments since Because makes the clause subordinate rather than independent .
sentences.chinese: 出现连词引导的分句一定要有对应的主句。

sentences.english: She will phrase a fugue of Bach's in these days.
sentences.chinese: 这几天她将把巴赫的赋格曲分成旋律分句。

sentences.english: She will phrase fugue of Bach's in these days.
sentences.chinese: 这几天她将把巴赫的赋格曲分成旋律分句。

sentences.english: The two clauses are joined by a conjunction.
sentences.chinese: 这两个分句由一个连词连在一起。

sentences.english: Chapter four is about the research of adjective clauses in a sentential level.
sentences.chinese: 第四章为对形容词性分句在句子层面上的研究。

sentences.english: Subjectless clauses appear in written English quite frequently.
sentences.chinese: 无主语分句在书面英语中出现的频率很高。

sentences.english: The two clauses are separated by a comma.
sentences.chinese: 这两个分句由一个逗号分开。

sentences.english: Sometimes, there may also contain clauses clauses.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，分句里面有可能还包含分句。

sentences.english: Sometimes, there may also contain clauses clauses.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，分句里面有可能还包含分句。

sentences.english: The clauses have different relations which are often denoted by correlatives.
sentences.chinese: 各分句之间可以有各种不同的关系，常用关联词表示。

sentences.english: So it has a kind of antecedent-consequent phrase structure with the chord.
sentences.chinese: 这里像是一个前后分句的结构，配上和弦。

definition: part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
